summary: ON ALL HARLEY MURRAY TRAILERS BUILT FROM MAY 2006 TO PRESENT EQUIPPED WITH DISC BRAKES AND 16 TIRE SUSPENSION, MULTIPLE FAILURES OF THE SUSPENSION HAVE OCCURRED ON THE AXLE HANGER. UP TILL SEPTEMBER 2013 APPROXIMATELY 120 TRAILERS HAVE BEEN BUILT WITH 37 FAILURES ON 21 TRAILERS ON THE AXLE HANGERS KNOWN UP TO THAT POINT. UNKNOWN IF ANY MORE FAILURES HAVE OCCURRED BEYOND THAT POINT.    *JS
